Docs.summary: Implements a parser for .aspx files. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET uses this class to parse .aspx pages.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether ASP.NET should optimize its internal handling of long strings that are encountered when ASP.NET parses a page or control.
Docs.value: if ASP.NET should optimize its internal handling of long strings; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks By default, the ASP.NET page parser converts literal strings that contain 256 or more characters into a temporary resource string. This property can be set to `false` in order to disable this behavior and instead to write the literal string directly to the response stream. This property can only be set in the Global.asax file before the `PreApplicationStart` event occurs. This property can be read at any time.
